questions: Do you have a strong knowledge of QA theory?
Do you have an understanding of Scrum and CI/CD?
Do you have good knowledge of REST API?
Do you have knowledge of SQL?
Do you have an upper-intermediate level of English (both written and spoken)?
Do you have basic knowledge of CLI?
Do you have basic knowledge of Azure?
Do you have an understanding of microservice architecture?
How quickly are you ready to join the work?
Will there be an opportunity to work in case of power outages?
